verses.roman:
ullāsa-upari lekhoṅ tomāra prasāda
nityānanda prabhu, mora kṣama aparādha

synonyms: ullāsa-upari—on account of great ecstasy; lekhoṅ—I write; tomāra prasāda—Your mercy; nityānanda prabhu—Lord Nityānanda; mora—my; kṣama—please excuse; aparādha—offenses.
translation: O Lord Nityānanda, I write of Your mercy out of great exultation. Please forgive me for my offenses.
